options.A: 3. class MyServlet extends HttpServlet {4. public void doPut(HttpServletRequest req,HttpServletResponse resp)throws ServletException, IOException {5. // servlet code here…26. }27. }If the DD contains a single security constraint associated with MyServlet and its only <httpmethod> tags and <auth-constraint> tags are:<http-method>GET</http-method><http-method>PUT</http-method><auth-constraint>Admin</auth-constraint>Which four requests would be allowed by the container? (Choose four.)
options.B: A user whose role is Admin can perform a PU
options.C: A user whose role is Admin can perform a GE
options.E: A user whose role is Admin can perform a POS
options.G: A user whose role is Member can perform a PU
options.I: A user whose role is Member can perform a POS
options.K: A user whose role is Member can perform a GE
